short_description:
PC-BASIC is a free, cross-platform interpreter for GW-BASIC, BASICA, PCjr Cartridge Basic and Tandy 1000 GW-BASIC. PC-BASIC is free and open source software released under the GPLv3. 

Note to all users
If you wish to avoid the misleading fake download buttons that SourceForge places on its download site, you can now download PC-BASIC from
https://github.com/robhagemans/pcbasic/releases

If you do choose to download from SourceForge, DO NOT CLICK ON ANY GREEN DOWNLOAD BUTTONS except the one labelled 'sf - Download PC-BASIC' followed by release number and operating system, in the box above this note.

Note to Linux users
The default download works on 32-bit Intel/AMD (i386) architecture only. For 64-bit Intel/AMD, please go to the downloads page and download the latest x86_64 release.

For bug reports and new features, please use the forum.
summary: A free, cross-platform emulator for GW-BASIC, PCjr & Tandy BASIC
